mapper.select: select * from (select bno,title,content, writer, regdate, updatedate, hit,rownum rn from (select * from tbl_board order by bno desc) where rownum <= (#{page}* 12)) where rn> (#{page}-1)*12
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content},writer = #{writer}, updatedate = sysdate where bno=#{bno}
update tbl_board set hit=hit+1 where bno=#{bno}
